attributes.action: Give British  residents of other countries the right to vote in UK elections
attributes.background: Having lived in Spain for over 15 years I still want to vote in my country of birth, where results affect my immediate family, not only myself.I contribute in Spain and have contributed in UK, therefore I have a right to have a say in my condition as resident/citizen

rejection.details:
The Government has said that it does have plans to change this rule. It's therefore not clear what action you would like the Government to take that is different from what it is already doing.

You can find more information in the Government's response to this petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112142
